Title: Greek on Windows Phone 7
Description: A small Silverlight application that allows you to type Greek characters for an SMS, an e-mail, or search at Bing or Google.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A small Silverlight application that allows you to type Greek characters for an SMS, an e-mail, or search at Bing or Google.


The application is still under development. Things considering to develop

- Currently it supports only portrait mode. Landscape would nice to have
- Windows Phone 7 currently supports Unicode, so one cannot send SMS with 160 characters. Looking for a fix.
- It would be nice to display a preview of the key currently being pressed, such as in the regular Windows Phone 7 keyboard.
